title: Reset Password
content: Users can reset password from Settings > Security. Click on 'Reset Password' and follow the email verification process.

title: Refund Policy
content: Refunds are allowed within 7 days of purchase. Contact support team with your order ID to initiate the refund process.

title: Account Setup
content: To set up your account, click on the signup button and provide your email address. You'll receive a verification email within 5 minutes.

title: Payment Methods
content: We accept credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through our payment gateway.

title: Subscription Plans
content: We offer three subscription plans: Basic ($9/month), Pro ($19/month), and Enterprise ($49/month). Each plan includes different features and usage limits.

title: Data Privacy
content: We take data privacy seriously. All user data is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your personal information with third parties without consent.

title: Mobile App
content: Our mobile app is available for both iOS and Android devices. You can download it from the App Store or Google Play Store.

title: Customer Support Hours
content: Our customer support team is available Monday through Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM EST. We also offer 24/7 email support for urgent issues.

title: API Integration
content: Developers can integrate our service using REST API. Documentation is available at docs.example.com/api. API keys can be generated from your account dashboard.

title: Cancellation Policy
content: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period.
